dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.

Re: Plagiarized/Copyright Content Theft

To whom it may concern:

I am writing to file a charge that Capital News is in violation of U.S. copyright laws. Search Query: "Chesnut' found it increasingly difficult to survive"

Please note that there are other queries that generate this result.

The infringing article by Rick Jenner can be found at. http://www.capitalnews.com.au/editorial.asp?editorial id=1088&issue=86 Our article is posted here:

http://www.musichox-online. com/reviews-2006/markchesnutt-hearditinalovesong.html

The posting of these materials infringes upon the copyrights of me and my company The Music Box. I may be contacted at the email address and phone number listed below.
